title: 94/337/EC: Commission Decision of 26 May 1994 amending Decision 88/479/EEC authorizing methods for grading pig carcases in Spain (Only the Spanish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 26 May 1994 amending Decision 88/479/EEC authorizing methods for grading pig carcases in Spain (Only the Spanish text is authentic) (94/337/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Part 2 (3) of the Annex to Decision 88/479/EEC is hereby replaced by the following:
'3. The lean meat content of the carcase shall be calculated according to the following formula:
^y = 61,56 + (- 0,878 x1) + (0,157 x2)
where:
^y = the estimated percentage of lean meat in the carcase,
x1 = the thickness of backfat (including rind) in millimetres, measured at six centimetres off the midline of the carcase, between the third and fourth last ribs,
x2 = the thickness of muscle in millimetres, measured at the same time and in the same place as x1.
The formula shall be valid for carcases weighing between 50 and 110 kilograms.`
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Spain.
